body: So there are shit like this too hum? Boa Hancock loves Luffy, she deserves vanilla hentai, and what yo all are making? Rape hentai, really sad
Very very good buildup but the final orgasm only lasted for like a page. would have been better if we could also see her immediately after the orgasm.

That was a weird doujinshi. Expected Luffy or someone to save hear. And that Noro Noro beam devil fruit explanation were just lame. Even if it's different type of Beam, you should be able to move your body. But the part with the panda palm were actually quite clever. So meh, meh. 2,5/5. ^^
